style: #app{display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly;flex-wrap:wrap}#app .item{display:inline-block;width:18%;min-height:240px;background:rgba(255,255,255,.3333333333);box-shadow:0 0 1vw .75vw rgba(0,0,0,.2);padding:1vw;margin:1vh 0;border-radius:.5em;transition:all .2s ease-in-out}@media screen and (max-width:1440px){#app .item{width:22.5%}}@media screen and (max-width:1080px){#app .item{width:30%}}@media screen and (max-width:720px){#app .item{width:45%}}@media screen and (max-width:480px){#app .item{width:90%}}#app .item:hover{box-shadow:0 0 2vw 1.5vw rgba(0,0,0,.2);transform:scale(1.05)}#app .item .typeName{font-size:1.5em;font-weight:600;position:relative}#app .item .typeName::after{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:100%;left:0;width:75%;height:.1em;background:#888;border-radius:.1em}#app .item .main .name{font-size:1.25em;font-weight:600;position:relative}#app .item .main .name::after{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:100%;left:0;width:50%;height:.1em;background:#888;border-radius:.1em}#app .item .main .other{position:relative}#app .item .main .other::before{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute;bottom:100%;left:0;width:25%;height:.1em;background:#888;border-radius:.1em;transform:translateY(150%)}@media(prefers-color-scheme:dark){#app .item{background:rgba(255,255,255,.1333333333);box-shadow:0 0 1vw .75vw rgba(0,0,0,.2)}}
script:
var i,res,log=console.log;log(document.location.href.toString().split("//")[0]+"//"+document.location.host.toString());var host=document.location.href.toString().split("//")[0]+"//"+document.location.host.toString();log(`${host}/formula.json`);var toMathStr=function(a){return a.replace(/[=]/g,"=").replace(/[*]/g,"×").replace(/[/]/g,"÷").replace(/pi/g,"π")};$.ajax({url:`${host}/data/formula.json`,type:"get",dataType:"json",success:function(a){for(log(a),res="",i=0;i',log(a.data[i]),res+=`
${a.data[i].name}
`,res+='
',log(j),res+=`
${a.data[i].data[j].name}
`,res+=`
${toMathStr(a.data[i].data[j].main.toString()).replace(/,/g,'
')}
`,a.data[i].data[j].other.length>0&&(res+=`
${toMathStr(a.data[i].data[j].other.toString()).replace(/,/g,'
')}
`),res+="
",log(res+="");document.querySelector("#app").innerHTML=res}});
